Articles.Content:
Okay I need to know what's going on. Starting today, everytime I tried to fly my Saturn V. This happens. The camera doesn't follow the command pod like it used to after ~6000m. 

![sl1HUkn.png](http://i.imgur.com/sl1HUkn.png)

![zaT4qdP.png](http://i.imgur.com/zaT4qdP.png)

Please! Give me a solution. Thank you. I need to know what's causing this. (Moved because it Involves mods)
